title.narrative: Appraisal of Danish Vulantary Contribution to the IEA for the Clean Energy Transitions Programme

description.narrative: • Quality assurance of the proposed Project Document. • Assess if the project design and documentation is relevant and adequate to produce the expected results in an effective, efficient and sustainable manner that is relevant to the key partners and has the potential to achieve the intended impact and long-term goals. • Ensure that the proposed project is within the objectives of the Strategy for Denmark’s development cooperation (“The World 2030”), the guiding principles for the Danish Climate Envelope, and other relevant Danida Aid Management Guidelines (AMG). • Make specific and actionable recommendations for necessary adjustments or improvements, as relevant, prior to submission to the grant authorities.
